column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2017
column14: Bought this for my teenage son.  He works out at least twice a day.  He was dealing with sweat rashes and body acne.  I was getting desperate trying to find a product that worked.  He loves this wash.  It keeps the breakouts under control. While not eliminated, it is reduced by about 90%.It is going on automatic shipments. BONUS: The peppermint helps his muscle recovery (or at least he feels it does).

column6: Best Smelling Stuff in the WORLD!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2020
column14: This smells SO GOOD - really unbelievable. This has become a favorite -- please don't change a thing! Love the name  because it is the total opposite!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2017
column14: It does a very good job as a face and body wash. My husband got it and my boys like it we bought another bottle from them. The smell definitely helps wake you up in the morning. It only has a minimum effect on sore muscles.

column6: This is my new favorite body wash
column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2017
column14: This is my new favorite body wash! It smells great and leaves my skin feeling smooth without dryness. It will leave you feeling really clean. These are the best wipes for the whole body. The single packaging is great for after the gym and leaves your body and skin feeling hydrated from the shea butter.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2019
column14: Love the name, love the strong fragrance! However it arrived with a loosen cap, so the outside was a little slimy. I screwed the cap on tight and double wrapped the bottle in paper towels and plastic wrap, then popped it into a zip bag to send off to my soldier. He loves it!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2018
column14: I bought this for my teenage son who plays multiple sports. He was starting to break out due to the pads and sweat. This has helped and we have purchased our second bottle. The items always arrive propmtly and in good condition. Great addition to his self care items.

column14: This product smells so good. It woke up me up lol. I recommend this product . All men should buy.
